name: Protocol Delta
description:
The network is on the brink of failure, but don't worry. We've implemented fail-safes. Initialize a Protocol to destroy the compromised data packets.

Protocol Delta is a fast paced arcade game that demands constant movement and quick reflexes. Explore various characters, each with unique abilities, to find one that suits your playstyle. Compete on global leaderboards and climb the ranks as you survive an endless onslaught of enemies.

Key Features:
• 10 Playable Characters, each with unique abilities
• Fast-Paced Gameplay
• Global Leaderboards
• Support for Gamepad or Keyboard+Mouse
• 15 Different Enemies
• Score Multiplier system that rewards careful play
